Definition.WordDefinition: Overly, ND (city, FIPS 60380) Location: 48.68123 N, 100.15073 W Population (1990): 25 (13 housing units) Area: 0.9 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 58360

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Overly \O"ver*ly\, a. 1. Careless; negligent; inattentive; superfical; not thorough. [Archaic] --Bp. Hall. [1913 Webster]
2. Excessive; too much. [R.] --Coleridge. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
overly \o"ver*ly\, adv. 1. In an overly manner. [Archaic] [1913 Webster]
2. Excessively. [PJC]
overly adv : to an excessive degree; "too big" [syn: {excessively}, {to a fault}, {too}]
